mapper.insert: insert into product_mst values( 0, #{category_code}, #{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{product_info}, #{product_size}, #{product_count}, now(), now() )

insert into product_file values
( 0, #{file.product_code}, #{file.file_name}, now(), now() )
mapper.select:
SELECT pm.product_code, pf.file_name, pm.product_name, pm.product_price, pm.product_size, pm.product_info,
cm.category_name FROM product_mst pm LEFT OUTER JOIN product_file pf ON(pf.product_code = pm.product_code) LEFT OUTER JOIN category_mst cm on (cm.category_code = pm.category_code) WHERE
pm.product_code = #{product_code}
pm.product_code = ( select max(product_code) from product_mst where product_code < #{product_code} )
pm.product_code = ( select min(product_code) from product_mst where product_code > #{product_code} )

SELECT pm.product_code, pm.product_size, pm.product_name, pm.product_price, pm.product_info, pf.file_name,
cm.category_name FROM product_mst pm LEFT OUTER JOIN product_file pf ON(pf.product_code = pm.product_code) LEFT OUTER JOIN category_mst cm on (cm.category_code = pm.category_code) where pm.product_code = #{product_code};
